Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html#/s:12UIEmp.name: detailLabel

Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html.name: UIEmptyStateView
Classes/UIEmptyStateView.html.abstract: A UIView which has a stack view and inside the stackview are 1-4 other views
